author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Code to check the HCAL sensitive touchables are identical for DDD/DD4Hep

#### PR validation:

Use the configuration file for DDD and DD4Hep. There are differences due to some rounding errors

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3 -hcx268 Code to check the HCAL sensitive touchables are identical for DDD/DD4Hep
